content.rendered:
It all started when three friends from engineering college came together to solve one question-

“How can we make good coffee affordable to the common man”?
Thus began 3 years of immense research, countless coffee tastings, r&d, experimenting and planning. In which tried hundreds of coffee blends and brands for these two years almost 1100 different recipes. After two years, we developed a plausible blueprint for the kiosk module. Finally, after those years found the perfect premium coffee blend, over 30 beverage recipes not only tasted great but also fall into our price quotient. The last whole year was dedicated to perfecting every recipe, in house trainers, and Kaffee masters incidentally laid the foundation for the success that you see today

What do we aim for?
Kiosk Kaffee is a brand on a mission to bring the best coffee which is aromatic, and full of flavours at affordable rates considering the common man. We are committed to an ideology of “make in India with love”. Our goal is to expand our current 20 outlets and 100 employees into 40 outlets with 300 employees by the end of 2022. We are on a mission to provide you with superior tasting, high-quality coffee and espresso drinks that you can enjoy on the go. Our beans are sourced, roasted, tested and calibrated in house. We are committed to roasting, grinding, brewing, and drinking exceptional coffees that are also affordable.
